title: Bobby And Caitlin's Forced Movie Review + Riddle Me This + Bobby’s Not Peeing Blood Anymore
itunes:title: Bobby And Caitlin's Forced Movie Review + Riddle Me This + Bobby’s Not Peeing Blood Anymore
description:
Bobby and his girlfriend Caitlin both watched ‘Box of Moonlight’ which was assigned as a 'forced movie review' by Lunchbox. They both share their review of the movie. We play another round of 'Riddle Me This' where the adults have to answer kids riddles. Plus, Bobby gives an update on his bike injury from yesterday.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
